data.comment: The big names in today's match at Spartak Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Mikhail Vilkov, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Khimki to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Tambov a goal kick.
Goal kick for Khimki at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 3, Tambov have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mikhail Vilkov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Khimki.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
In the minute 7, Tambov drive upfield and Nikita Chicherin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Khimki defender.
Can Tambov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
Tambov have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Tambov.
In the minute 12, Khimki surge into the attack at Spartak Stadium but Aleksandr Troshechkinâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Tambov's Mikhail Kostyukov gets in a shot on goal at Spartak Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
Valeriu Ciuperca scores to make it 1-0 at Spartak Stadium.
Oleksandr Kaplienko with an assist there.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Tambov.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a throw-in for Tambov, close to Khimki's area.
In the minute 19, Ilya Lantratov returns to the field for Khimki after picking up a slight injury.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Tambov to check on Ilya Lantratov, who is grimacing with pain.
Khimki's Artem Polyarus gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tambov defender.
In the minute 22, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Aleksandr Troshechkin for Khimki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 22, Tambov make their first substitution with Evgeni Shlyakov replacing Aleksey Rybin.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
In the minute 24, Khimki's Dmitri Tikhiy breaks free at Spartak Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 25, Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a Tambov throw-in in Khimki's half.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Tambov's Aleksandre Karapetian gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Khimki have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tambov.
In the minute 35, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a Khimki throw-in in Tambov's half.
Tambov needs to be cautious. Khimki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Aleksey Gritsaenko (Tambov) sees red and is sent off in Tambov!
The home team have replaced Aleksandre Karapetian with Anton Kilin. This is the second substitution made today by Sergey Pervushin.
Valeriu Ciuperca is booked for the home team.
In the minute 42, In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Tambov Khimki attack through Artem Polyarus. The finish is off target, however.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Tambov a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Tambov.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Khimki to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 45, Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun has been booked in Tambov.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Spartak Stadium.
The away team replace Kirill Bozhenov with Alesandr Lomovitskiy.
Mohamed Konate is on a sub for Kamran Aliev for Khimki.
In the minute 47, Khimki are coming forward and Mohamed Konate gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 50, Tambov have been awarded a penalty...
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vladimir Obukhov for Tambov gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Vladimir Obukhov (Tambov) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Tambov.
In the minute 54, Free kick in a good position for Tambov!
Alesandr Lomovitskiy (Khimki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Tambov.
In the minute 56, Tambov have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
Danil Lipovoy is replacing Vladimir Dyadyun for the away team.
In the minute 59, Mohamed Konate (Khimki) strikes at Spartak Stadium but his header is cleared.
Artem Polyarus (Khimki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Tambov.
In the minute 61, The match at Spartak Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mikhail Kostyukov, who is down injured.
In Tambov Khimki attack through Artem Polyarus. The finish is off target, however.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Tambov a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Khimki to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In Tambov, Mohamed Konate (Khimki) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Free kick Tambov.
In the minute 64, Tambov's Mikhail Kostyukov is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Khimki's Arshak Koryan breaks free at Spartak Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Maksim Martusevich (Khimki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
In the minute 67, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksandr Troshechkin (Khimki) has received a yellow card from Mikhail Vilkov.
Guram Tetrashvili (Tambov) has replaced the possibly injured Mikhail Kostyukov.
Mikhail Vilkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Kirill Panchenko is on a sub for Vladimir Obukhov for Tambov.
In the minute 70, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Throw-in Khimki.
Mohamed Konate (Khimki) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 72, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Tambov needs to be cautious. Khimki have an attacking throw-in.
Khimki's Egor Danilkin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
In the minute 75, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Tambov Tambov's Anton Kilin is caught offside.
Mohamed Konate for Khimki is whistled offside.
In the minute 77, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Khimki just outside Tambov's area.
Evgeni Shlyakov (Tambov) gets a yellow card.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Tambov a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Mikhail Vilkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Tambov.
In the minute 85, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov blows against Khimki's Aleksandr Troshechkin for offside.
Important block from the Tambov defence as Arshak Koryan fires in a strike for Khimki.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
In the minute 86, Dmitri Tikhiy for Khimki has been booked by Mikhail Vilkov and receives a first yellow card.
Khimki's Mohamed Konate breaks free at Spartak Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Khimki.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a Khimki throw-in in Tambov's half.
Khimki push forward at Spartak Stadium and Aleksandr Troshechkin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tambov defence.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Tambov.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Tambov.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Tambov. The final score is 1-0.
Artem Polyarus is booked for the away team.
Arshak Koryan (Khimki) gets a yellow card.
